knimeNode.name: Cyface Binary Format Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads a file in Cyface binary format and transforms it to a KNIME table

intro.p: This package contains all the classes required for the Cyface binary format reader node. The node is capable of parsing an unzipped file in Cyface binary format and extract all the data (geo locations, accelerations, rotations and directions) from it into 4 seperate tables.

fullDescription.option: Select an input file in Cyface binary format.

ports.outPort: The output table containing the smoothed signal either by replacing the input column or appended as a new column.
